entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:32 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:32 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
